spacing-tight.$description: Tight spacing for very dense layouts - minimal spacing between elements

lufa.useCase: Icon-text spacing, minimal gaps, dense toolbars, button icon spacing

spacing-compact.$description: Compact spacing for tight layouts and dense UIs

lufa.useCase: Dense forms, compact cards, toolbar spacing, tight button padding

spacing-default.$description: Default spacing for standard layouts (most common)

lufa.useCase: Standard button padding, card padding, form field spacing, list item gaps

spacing-comfortable.$description: Comfortable spacing for relaxed, breathable layouts

lufa.useCase: Spacious cards, comfortable forms, section padding, hero components

spacing-spacious.$description: Spacious spacing for generous, airy layouts

lufa.useCase: Large components, hero sections, landing page spacing, emphasis areas
